page.title: 11THE FARMING YEAR.
page.content: IN THE{WINTER}MR.KEEL PLANTS CROPS LIKE WHEAT AND BARLEY. HE SPRAYS THE CROPS FOR BUGS,WEEDS AND OTHER THINGS THAT MIGHT DAMAGE THEM. HE ALSO FERTILIZES THE LAND TO HELP THE CROPS GROW BIG AND STRONG. IN THE{SPRING}HE SPRAYS THE CROPS AND OFTEN CUTS THE GRASS TO MAKE THE FIRST SILAGE IN MARCH OR APRIL.IN MAY HE SOMETIMES MAKES HAY. IN THE{SUMMER}HE MAKES THE SECOND CUT OF SILAGE AND HE ALSO DOES SOME HAY MAKING.HE SPRAYS THE CROPS A LOT. THE CROPS ARE USUALLY HARVESTED IN AUGUST OR SEPTEMBER. HE USES THE STALKS FOR STRAW. THE COWS EAT THE HAY AND HE USES THE STRAW FOR BEDDING. IN THE{AUTUMN}HE PLOUGHS THE FIELDS AND SPRAYS THE GRASS TO KILL THE WEEDS. SOMETIMES HE GROWS SOME LATE BARLEY AND WHEAT.
